Name: Urban Oasis Hostel
Description: Modern hostel with a vibrant community, perfect for digital nomads and young professionals.

Policies.RoomLeavingCriteria: One month notice required before check-out
Policies.CancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before check-in
Policies.RentKroSupportTeam: Available 24/7 for any queries or assistance

SpecialOffers.LongTermDiscount: 10% off for stays over 3 months
SpecialOffers.EarlyBirdDiscount: 5% off for bookings made 2 months in advance

Reviews.Comment: Great location and friendly staff. The co-working space was a big plus!
Clean rooms and good amenities. Wish the kitchen was a bit larger.
